thread.title: Twitter is not a fan Jimmy Fallon's Chris Rock impression
thread.title_full: Twitter is not a fan Jimmy Fallon's Chris Rock impression

author: Proma Khosla
title: Twitter is not a fan Jimmy Fallon's Chris Rock impression
text:
Jimmy Fallon raised a few eyebrows by including an impersonation of comedian Chris Rock in his Golden Globes opening Sunday evening.
Fallon said that he had consulted other awards show hosts to prepare for the Golden Globes, and then launched into an impression of Rock. Whether or not his impression was accurate, many viewers deemed it inappropriate....and it reminded quite a few people of a certain cringe-y Office episode.
SEE ALSO: Issa Rae called out Donald Trump on Golden Globes red carpet
Jimmy Fallon's Chris Rock impressions is... uh, well.... pic.twitter.com/VIj4niRcMt
— Mash Entertainment (@mashentertain) January 9, 2017
Wasn't there an entire episode of an NBC sitcom devoted to explaining why impressions of Chris Rock are a bad idea #GoldenGlobes
— Victoria McNally (@vqnerdballs) January 9, 2017
Jimmy Fallon's Chris Rock impression is like when Michael Scott did his Chris Rock impression. #GoldenGlobes
— merideth (@merideth) January 9, 2017
Did jimmy Fallon just impersonate Chris rock.... pic.twitter.com/PyTvUwxQk0
— Ryan Bennett (@Ryb213) January 9, 2017
And The Office isn't the only NBC comedy to have preemptively advised Fallon's decision:
To: Jimmy Fallon
Subject: Your Chris Rock Impression #GoldenGlobes pic.twitter.com/cPlQaYcdUy
— HOMELY BABY NEWYEAR (@TheHomelyBaby) January 9, 2017
Jimmy Fallon impersonating Chris Rock to joke about People vs OJ is peak White Hollywood. #GoldenGlobes
— Manuel (@bmanuel) January 9, 2017
Not gonna lie. Jimmy Fallon's Chris Rock impression made me cringe. #GoldenGlobes
— Amanda Iman (@MandaAiley) January 9, 2017
Jimmy Fallon and this Chris Rock impersonation..it's a no for me. #GoldenGlobes
— S. Wright (@sarafinasaid) January 9, 2017
oh god, make Jimmy Fallon stop with the Chris Rock impression #GoldenGlobes pic.twitter.com/f2HMRAjXVJ
— Red Painter (@Redpainter1) January 9, 2017
My reaction to Jimmy Fallon's Chris Rock impersonation and pretty much in general #GoldenGlobes pic.twitter.com/SZtwL2SUTA
— Joshua (@Brood_Tweets_TV) January 9, 2017
